title: WebQuest-Based Architectural Design Education: Enhancing Practitioner Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Architectural Design Concepts and Mathematical Principles, Smartphone Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: For in-service elementary educators aiming to integrate architectural design into their teaching, with consideration for visual and sequential learning preferences

learning_goals: Learners can explain the architectural design process (problem definition → research → development → evaluation) with 80% accuracy
Learners can create three or more design solutions applicable to elementary education settings using webquest tools
Learners can incorporate feedback on design projects via online collaboration tools within 48 hours

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
